thread.title: Serious knee injury rules Newcastle goalkeeper Tim Krul out for rest of season - Halstead Gazette

author: Source: Halstead Gazette
title: Serious knee injury rules Newcastle goalkeeper Tim Krul out for rest of season - Halstead Gazette
text:
Newcastle goalkeeper Tim Krul has been ruled out for the rest of the season with a serious knee injury, the club have confirmed. Assessments have revealed the 27-year-old ruptured an anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee during Holland's Euro 2016 qualifier in Kazakhstan on Saturday.
 Halstead Gazette.
